pages.text: $(#e2a3ff)Link to folder + download$() to all file changes (a changelog is included on top of other info like instructions)$()$(br2)$(br)Mods are not always the option to solving performance issues (though they help and improve performance either way). Rather, non-mod alternatives like config tweaks, scripts, etc is needed to change a few things and give a little boost.$(br2)

Adding performance mods and tweaking things can only help so much though; at the end of the day, it always comes down to your hardware. $(#e2a3ff)Refer to this document$() I put together to see if it is possibly your hardware not being powerful enough.$(br2)All of these file changes and/or additions are optional, but beware picking and chosing may cause certain things to break. I'll try to document what changes rely on others.
